name: Sunrise Doll: The Justly Devoted to Banishment
name_original: Sunrise Doll: The Justly Devoted to Banishment
description:
Sunrise Doll: The Justly Devoted to Banishment is a simplistic 2D action bullet hell game where you take control of Pawn - the titular sunrise doll, who uses her banishment blade to weaken the forces of evil and exile their black souls to the underworld.
However, this time the goddess of the realm has informed Pawn that there is evil growing within the very place she banishes it to. In this adventure, Pawn has to traverse the underworld itself, where all the demons from her past battles are sealed. Every living soul has its own spot reserved in the underworld, and while the doll can still use her blade to weaken the forces of evil, she can no longer banish them, because you cannot banish someone to the place they're already at. As such, Pawn has to collect their weakened souls instead.
As she ventures deeper and deeper into the layers of the underworld, Pawn is going to face many enemies, big and small, until she finds out what has caused the unrest among the banished.

The game is currently in development, but a trial version is available to download.

Upcoming features:
- campaign mode with 20 levels, 5 bosses and multiple endings
- saving and loading replays
- soundtrack
- a better level editing environment

Inspired by Highly Responsive to Prayers by Team Shanghai Alice.
